T02D2456:128b-0: @128b * // rnal 'byor ba'i rtog pa'i gegs sel ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2456:128b-1: rje btsun bla ma rnams dang /
T02D2456:128b-2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2456:128b-3: ci phyir zhen gang gis gang la gang ltar bsgom //
T02D2456:128b-4: rtags dang yon tan bar chad gegs skyon bsal //
T02D2456:128b-5: de dag shes na goms pas byang chub 'thob //
T02D2456:128b-6: ma thos mi shes mi grub yang na 'gyangs //
T02D2456:128b-7: dang po ci phyir bsgom pa gzung 'dzin gnyis //
T02D2456:128b-8: ma spangs ji bzhin ma bsgoms rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2456:128b-9: phyag 'tshal mchod bshags sbyin pa mang byas kyang //
T02D2456:128b-10: bsod nams 'phel yang ye shes rdzogs mi 'gyur //
T02D2456:128b-11: gnyis pa gang gis rnal 'byor dang ldan pa //
T02D2456:128b-12: thos mang brtson zhing dam tshig sdom gnas shing //
T02D2456:128b-13: mchod dang sbyin mos byang chub sems ldan pa //
T02D2456:128b-14: de ni theg chen gsang ba'i snod yin bsgom //
T02D2456:128b-15: gsum pa gang la zhe na rang gi sems //
T02D2456:128b-16: ji bzhin ma bcos ye nas rnam dag cing //
T02D2456:128b-17: spros bral yod med rtag chad mtha' spangs pa //
T02D2456:128b-18: de la g-yeng ba med par rtag tu gnas //
T02D2456:128b-19: bzhi pa gang ltar bsgom pa bsgom bya dang //
T02D2456:128b-20: bsgom pa gnyis med rang gi ngo bo la //
T02D2456:128b-21: ci yang med la cir yang snang gsal bar //
T02D2456:128b-22: bying rmugs spros pa'i rtog pa med par bsgom //
T02D2456:128b-23: lnga pa de rtags rnal 'byor brtson ldan la //
T02D2456:128b-24: dang po gnyid dang 'dod sred chung bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:128b-25: de nas rim gyis rmi lam 'dod la sogs //
T02D2456:128b-26: rtog pa ji bzhin cho 'phrul gzugs kyang ston //
T02D2456:128b-27: drug pa de yi yon tan bsam brjod pa //
T02D2456:128b-28: mngon sum tshe ring nad rnams gso ba dang //
T02D2456:128b-29: bgegs sel la sogs yon tan mang po 'byung //
T02D2456:129a-0: de bzhin rim gyis byang chub lam la 'jug / bdun pa @129a * //
T02D2456:129a-1: bar chad bgegs ni rnal 'byor ba //
T02D2456:129a-2: gnas sbang gnas 'tshol gzhan du 'gro 'dod na //
T02D2456:129a-3: gnod sbyin gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro 'dod de //
T02D2456:129a-4: rnal 'byor sems la zhugs nas gnas gzhan 'phen //
T02D2456:129a-5: ga lte rnal 'byor bsgom zhing gnas bzung bas //
T02D2456:129a-6: smra bcad par skabs nang du gzhan 'jug dang /
T02D2456:129a-7: phyir byung khengs grags 'dod brkam zas nor tshol //
T02D2456:129a-8: yi dags 'dod sred can gdon de sems zhugs //
T02D2456:129a-10: 'khor la gshe dang gzhan la spyod byed na //
T02D2456:129a-11: 'byung po'i bdag po ye ba sho na pa //
T02D2456:129a-12: sgrub pa de yi snying la zhugs pa yin //
T02D2456:129a-13: gal te rnal 'byor 'phres shing nyal la dga' //
T02D2456:129a-14: zas skom sred cing bzlas la mi brtson na //
T02D2456:129a-15: lto 'phye nyal brtson snyom byed ces bya ba //
T02D2456:129a-16: rnal 'byor sems la zhugs nas gnas par byed //
T02D2456:129a-17: gal te rnal 'byor rang gi longs spyod rkyen //
T02D2456:129a-18: yo byad srung zhing so 'dzugs srung ma bsko //
T02D2456:129a-19: gsog phyir 'dod tshol gzhan du gtong 'dod na //
T02D2456:129a-20: gnod sbyin nor bsrung zhes bya sems la zhugs //
T02D2456:129a-21: gal te rnal 'byor pha ma spun tshogs la //
T02D2456:129a-22: chags nas smon lam rim gros srung byed na //
T02D2456:129a-23: lhan cig skyes pa'i bag chags ma byang bas //
T02D2456:129a-24: nyon mongs ma sbangs byang chub ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:129a-25: gal te rnal 'byor gza' skar 'jug phod dang //
T02D2456:129a-26: dus dang lo zla bzang ngan na rtsi byed na //
T02D2456:129a-27: dbyer med mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bas na //
T02D2456:129a-28: byang chub thob par rab tu dka' bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:129a-29: gal te rnal 'byor thos mang rtogs che zhing //
T02D2456:129a-30: bsgom brtson bsnyems pas bdag bstod gzhan smod na //
T02D2456:129a-31: nyon mongs ma spangs nga rgyal 'phel 'gyur bas //
T02D2456:129a-32: phyir yang lhung zhing byang chub ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:129a-33: gal te rnal 'byor bdag la gzhan dag gis //
T02D2456:129a-34: sngon dang da ltar ma 'ongs gnod byed ces //
T02D2456:129a-35: zhe sdang skyes nas rig sdang gsod gtong na //
T02D2456:129a-36: zhe sdang dbang gis byang chub ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:129a-37: gal te bdag la gzhan gyi mchod bkur zhing //
T02D2456:129a-38: bsngags pa mang brjod bstod la sems dga' na //
T02D2456:129a-39: 'gro la phyogs char gyur te chags sems kyis //
T02D2456:129a-40: byang chub lam la 'dis kyang ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:129b-0: gal te rnal @129b 'byor 'khor mang 'du long dag
T02D2456:129b-1: / rgyal po lta bur mang por brten na ni
T02D2456:129b-2: // khengs grags yin pas bsgom pa g-yeng ba'i rgyu //
T02D2456:129b-3: byang chub lam las shin tu ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2456:129b-4: brgyad pa skyon bsal thabs ni rnal 'byor ba //
T02D2456:129b-5: sems la bar chad mtshan ma de byung na //
T02D2456:129b-6: 'di ltar bsams nas mtshan rtog bsal bar bya //
T02D2456:129b-7: chos su ci snang sems las gzhan med cing //
T02D2456:129b-8: sems kyi rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo la //
T02D2456:129b-9: bzang ngan sbong len 'dod sred byams sdang sogs //
T02D2456:129b-10: rtog dang rtog pa'i dbang gis bgegs byung na //
T02D2456:129b-11: sems la bltas na gang yang mi snang bas //
T02D2456:129b-12: snang med sems rtog mtshan ma ga la yod //
T02D2456:129b-13: bdag rtog mtshan mar sems la bzung nyes pas //
T02D2456:129b-14: rtog pa thams cad spangs shing rtog med gnas //
T02D2456:129b-15: rtog pa med pa la yang gnas pa med //
T02D2456:129b-16: de ltar ring du gnas na rtog bgegs ni //
T02D2456:129b-17: myur bar zhig nas ji bzhin bsgom pa la //
T02D2456:129b-18: bar chad sems kyi rtog pa 'byung mi 'gyur //
T02D2456:129b-19: byang chub 'bras bu myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02D2456:129b-20: rnal 'byor ba'i rtog ba'i gegs sel ba zhes bya
T02D2456:129b-21: ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen
